Subject: Consuite Chaos: A Cthulhu LARP
Description: Welcome to Unicon! Your favorite nerd-stravaganza is hosted this year at the newly-renovated historic River Grand Hotel. It's midnight in the Consuite, but that doesn't mean it's quiet. The caffeine is flowing, the snacks are plentiful, and everyone is having a great time, until THINGS begin to happen... Terror and Tentacles presents a horrorful live action game guaranteed to stun the senses. No experience necessary.  Speakers include:Conor Esselink, Gnora Ford-Lepthien, Laura Cascos, Beth Bondono, Owen Bondono, Erika Wagner - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 4 hours
